column4: Hello. Running Ubuntu v8.04 here. Can I update to v9.04 via a CD without problems, or is it best to install v9.04 "clean"?
Its not recommended to update from 8.04 to 9.04 directly because it can cause problems, you'd need to upgrade to 8.10 and then to 9.04 to avoid problems
rww mkay then.... what's the best way of upgrading then? I can't seem to find anywhere of doing it within Ubuntu, so I need to manually download something, right?
